doc:
Templar Saxe https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Templar_Saxe 0 Templar Saxe (born Templer William Edward Edevein; August 22, 1865 – April 17, 1935) was a British born stage actor, opera singer and silent film actor. In films, he usually was a character actor as his singing voice could not be used in silent films. He was born in Redhill, Surrey, England and died in Cincinnati, Ohio. Templar_Saxe ( born Templer_William_Edward_Edevein ; August_22_,_1865 – April_17_,_1935 ) was a_British_born_stage_actor , opera_singer and silent_film_actor . In films , he usually was a_character_actor as his_singing_voice could_not_be_used in silent_films . He was_born in Redhill , Surrey , England and died in Cincinnati , Ohio .
